pageContext.claim: “The new Air Force One, which we ordered, which they've been trying to order for a lot of years, we were able to shave $1.5 billion off the price.”
pageContext.analysis: False. Trump often tells a long story about how he squeezed Boeing for more than $1 billion in savings during his first weeks in office. The cost of the new Air Force One jets has actually gone up by more than $1 billion, according to the Pentagon's first formal acquisition report for the aircraft.
